content:
We have had success with making the data type of an identifier a choice of profiles of Identifier. See AU Base Organization Profile.

However the generated definitions page shows Type as "Identifier(Identifier)", it does not mention the other types. See Organization.identifier

I would like it to display all of the types.
I have the same problem with CodeableConcept
@Grahame Grieve I guess this is in the publisher code? Let me know if there's template work to do
